title: Shadow of Purity
description: Ashriel, fallen from the grace of Eden, has spent long centuries avoiding the judgement of his former superior. Humanity's time is drawing to a close however, and Ashriel finds himself as the fulcrum on which fate turns. His rebellion and personal crusades may be the only hope left. Ashriel must delve into his own forgotten past, hold discourse with angels and demons and discover the truth behind his own existence if he is to have any chance of survival, but the Seraph of Purity has other plans... and will stop at nothing to see them come to fruition.
author: Kaine Andrews
